name: last november
description:
If it is what has to happen it is what should be happening & though if it is not happening it is free free to imagine happening otherwise. If it happens it happens that even if otherwise even it happens that it should not happen, or only in small measures. If it happens that even people who are in leaving if it happens if it has to happen & though if it is not happening it is imaginative it is imaginative.

  • Use the table of contents on the left side of the screen to navigate to different pages of the zine. 
  • Click the words on each page to turn them on or off. Try arranging my writing into your own poems. 
  • Click the bolded links at the bottom of each page for different arrangements & ephemera.
  • Poke around on the blank pages.
  • Have fun erasing.

Please enable cookies to play—I don't know what to tell you. John Sugarcube, inventor of the sugarcube story format, says "you gotta." It'll also be hard to read this on a phone, you're really gonna benefit from having a cursor.

A plaintext document of the unmodified poems in this zine can be downloaded below.

Submission to Poetry Jam; February 2020
